description: CloudStackCluster is the Schema for the cloudstackclusters API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: CloudStackClusterSpec defines the desired state of CloudStackCluster.

host.description: The hostname on which the API server is serving.

port.description: The port on which the API server is serving.

identityRef.description: CloudStackIdentityReference is a reference to an infrastructure provider identity to be used to provision cluster resources.

kind.description: Kind of the identity. Must be supported by the infrastructure provider and may be either cluster or namespace-scoped.

name.description: Name of the infrastructure identity to be used.

status.description: The actual cluster state reported by CloudStack.

domainID.description: Cloudstack Domain ID the cluster is built in.

loadBalancerRuleID.description: The ID of the lb rule used to assign VMs to the lb.

networkID.description: Cloudstack Network ID the cluster is built in.

networkType.description: Cloudstack Network Type the cluster is built in.

publicIPID.description: The CS public IP ID to use for the k8s endpoint.

ready.description: Reflects the readiness of the CS cluster.

zoneID.description: The CS zone ID the cluster is built in.
